DataListSpec.Name: Designations with BBNC ID Data List
DataListSpec.Description: Contains Designation information, including the ID used for BBIS payments
DataListSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

SPDataList.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATALIST_DESIGNATIONLISTWITHBBNCID(@CONTEXTID nvarchar(1)) as set nocount on;
select d.ID as DESIGNATIONID, case when d.USERID = d.VANITYNAME then d.USERID else d.USERID + ' ' + d.VANITYNAME end as DESIGNATIONNAME, bbnc.ID as BBNCID from dbo.DESIGNATION d join dbo.BBNCDESIGNATIONIDMAP bbnc on d.ID = bbnc.DESIGNATIONID where d.ISACTIVE = 1 order by DESIGNATIONNAME
